hero.subtitle: Advanced palm reading analysis powered by artificial intelligence. Discover your future, character, and hidden talents written in the lines of your palm.

validation.title: AI Validation
validation.description: Automatic verification that the photo shows a palm

analysis.title: Deep Analysis
analysis.description: Detailed report of all lines and signs

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Your photos are safe and confidential

sample.title: Sample Analysis
sample.description: See what a full palm analysis conducted by our artificial intelligence looks like. Below is a sample result.

cta.title: Want to know your future?
cta.description: Perform your own palm analysis and discover what the lines of your palm say about your character, talents, and destiny.

sample.overallDescription: Your palm indicates a person of exceptional potential. The lines are clear and deep, indicating strong will and determination.

heartLine.title: Heart Line
heartLine.description: A long and clear heart line indicates an emotional person capable of deep feelings and lasting relationships.

headLine.title: Head Line
headLine.description: A straight and clear head line indicates logical thinking and analytical abilities.

lifeLine.title: Life Line
lifeLine.description: A deep and long life line indicates good vitality and life energy.

fateLine.title: Fate Line
fateLine.description: A clear fate line suggests a clear life path and strong sense of purpose.

jupiterStar.name: Star on Jupiter's Mount
jupiterStar.meaning: Indicates great success and recognition in professional life

triangle.name: Triangle on the Palm
triangle.meaning: Symbol of luck and prosperity in finances

sample.careerPrediction: Career: In the coming years, you will experience a significant promotion or a new, exciting career path.
sample.relationshipPrediction: Relationships: A deep emotional connection with your partner will bring stability and happiness.
sample.talentPrediction: Talents: You will discover hidden artistic or creative abilities within yourself.

upload.title: Upload Your Palm Photo
upload.description: Take a clear photo of the inside of your left palm in good lighting. Make sure all lines are visible.
upload.loginRequired: Log in to perform an analysis
upload.validationFailed: No palm detected in the image. Please try again.
upload.noCredits: No credits. Purchase credits to continue.

history.title: Analysis History
history.description: Browse your previous palm readings and track changes over time.
history.noAnalyses: You don't have any analyses yet
history.noAnalysesDescription: Perform your first palm analysis to see it here.
history.loginDescription: You must be logged in to view your analysis history.

auth.description: Log in or create an account to start analyzing your palm.
auth.signupSuccess: Account created! You can now log in.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters

imageUpload.dragHere: Drag a photo here or click to select
imageUpload.additionalInfoPlaceholder: E.g. Your age, dominant hand, questions about the future...

camera.title: Take a Palm Photo
camera.placePalmInFrame: Place your palm in the frame
